course.subject: TEMG
course.name: Special Project: 9th International T&M Business Plan Competition - U.S.A.
course.description: HKUST Students will join students from University of Illinois, the University of Sao Paulo and University of Bayreuth to travel to San Francisco and Silicon Valley for local cultural immersion and visiting leading innovative companies and startup. The challenge of this international business plan competition is for each team made up of students from 4 different universities to work together to create a novel business plan using innovative technologies and business models to address new business opportunities made possible by advancement in automotive and information communication technologies within the transportation ecosystem. Learning objectives include: (1) Improve global culture awareness and sensitivity; (2) Improve knowledge in automotive and communication technology; (3) Improve skills in business planning and pitching; and (4) Improve project planning, team coordination and leadership skills. Only students from the Dual Degree Program in Technology and Management may apply. Enrolment requires approval of course instructor.
